#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	int fact[]={1,1,2,6,24,120,720,5040,40320,362880,3628800,39916800};
	while(t--)
	{
      int a,b,c,d,e;
      int A[11];
      for(a=0;a<11;a++)
      {
         cin>>A[a];
      }
      cin>>b;
      sort(A,A+11);
      reverse(A,A+11);
      c=count(A,A+11,A[b-1]);
      d=count(A,A+b,A[b-1]);
      e=(fact[c])/(fact[c-d]*fact[d]);
      cout<<e<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
